projects.title: Amazon Reviews Sentiment Analysis
projects.description: Sentiment analysis tool processing 10k+ Amazon reviews; achieved 92% accuracy in classifying sentiments using NLP and ML models.
projects.longDescription: Advanced sentiment analysis system that processes large-scale Amazon product reviews using natural language processing and machine learning techniques. The model achieved 92% accuracy in sentiment classification, providing valuable insights for business intelligence and customer feedback analysis.

projects.title: EverCare Healthcare App
projects.description: Android healthcare mobile application providing appointment booking, health record tracking, and reminders for medication.
projects.longDescription: Comprehensive healthcare mobile application built for Android platform. Features include seamless appointment scheduling, secure health record management, medication reminder system, and user-friendly interface for patients and healthcare providers.

projects.title: IoT-Based Food Spoilage Detection System
projects.description: IoT-based solution for detecting food spoilage using gas sensors and sending alerts via a mobile interface.
projects.longDescription: Innovative IoT system that monitors food freshness using advanced gas sensors to detect spoilage indicators. The system sends real-time alerts through a mobile interface, helping reduce food waste and ensure food safety in homes and commercial establishments.

projects.title: Heart Disease Prediction System
projects.description: Predictive model analyzing health data for heart disease; delivered 86% prediction accuracy using machine learning algorithms.
projects.longDescription: Machine learning-based predictive system for early detection of heart disease risk. Uses comprehensive health data analysis including patient history, vital signs, and lifestyle factors to provide accurate predictions with 86% accuracy, supporting healthcare professionals in preventive care.

projects.title: Music Streaming Website
projects.description: A responsive music streaming website showcasing playlists, dark theme UI, and online radio integration built with modern web technologies.
projects.longDescription: Feature-rich music streaming platform with responsive design, playlist management, dark theme interface, and integrated online radio functionality. Built using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap for optimal user experience across all devices.

projects.title: PVPSIT Events Portal
projects.description: A dynamic events portal for PVPSIT to display event schedules, registrations, and announcements in real-time using React and deployed on Vercel.
projects.longDescription: Modern events management portal developed for PVPSIT college featuring real-time event schedules, student registration system, announcement broadcasting, and responsive design for seamless user experience across devices.
